resources.string: 1, use specification
Your user agrees:
Follow any applicable laws, agreed terms, and good manners, and respect the privacy of others.
Use this app only for private, non-commercial use.

To obtain any consent, permission or authorization required to post, post or submit information or materials, and to assume any responsibility arising from posting, posting or submitting information or materials.

Do not post, post or submit illegal, misleading, insulting, defamatory, harassing, defamatory or other inappropriate information, do not distribute or post spam, extra large files exceeding reasonable capacity, viruses, etc. .

The APP may not be modified, translated, resold, sublicensed, leased, reverse engineered, or removed, circumvented, decoded, or otherwise altered or interfered with any applicable usage practices, Or attempt to circumvent APP’s Content Copy Protection feature or any other technology used to control access or use of the Content or its identified material.
Do not use any other technology that may harm the interests or property of this APP or other users.
Do not use any automated system or method not provided by NTUB to connect, acquire, copy or monitor any part of this app.

You agree to provide true and complete information when you register for this application, and keep such information up-to-date. You must carefully store your User’s name and password to prevent improper use by others and assume any responsibility arising out of the use of this App.
2, NTUB permissions
You understand and license the following rights of Beijing Business University, its service providers and partners:

Freely use, modify, rewrite, reproduce, distribute, publish and display your users posted, posted or submitted in the public area or shared area of ​​the APP within the scope necessary to provide the service. Information or materials, including other information or materials related to the content provided by your users.
has the right but not the obligation to supervise, adjust or delete the content of this app or the information or materials posted, posted or submitted by your users.

In order to protect this APP, the APP provider, the Internet provider or other affected or potentially affected users, you have the right to restrict the use of this APP or delete the account that your user has registered.
You may terminate or change the APP and its content and related terms at any time without prior notice to your users.
3, privacy statement

NTUB’s personal information collected by your users using this app will be protected by the Privacy Policy. By registering as a member of this APP, you indicate that you have read, understood and fully agree to the following instructions:
NTUB APP user
Scope of the Privacy Policy
Information collected by NTUB
How NTUB will use the collected information
User-shared information (information transparency and options)
Access and update your personal information
NTUB shared information
User profile retention period
Information Security
Policy implementation and cooperation with the competent authority
Change and contact
4, intellectual property rights statement

The ownership, copyright and other wisdom of this app and its content (but not including information or materials posted, posted or submitted by users on the message wall, public areas or shared areas of this app) Property rights are owned by NTUB.
5, disclaimer
You are responsible for all risks of using this app. NTUB is not responsible for any loss caused by browsing or using this app, nor does it provide any kind, express or implied warranty.
NTUB is committed to the accuracy and completeness of the contents of this app, but NTUB does not assume any liability for errors or omissions.

NTUB is committed to maintaining the operation and execution of this APP, but NTUB is not responsible for any loss caused by any interruption (including but not limited to interference and interruption of telecommunications services) by your users.

Except for the contents of NTUB, including but not limited to the pages linked through this app, NTUB will not be responsible for accidents (including infection with computer or mobile phone viruses), embarrassment, copyright infringement. Or the loss or liability caused by intellectual property rights, including but not limited to profits, goodwill, use, loss of data or other intangible losses, Beijing Commercial University does not assume any direct, indirect, incidental, special, derivative or punitive damages or liabilities. . Whether or not to use the services of this APP to download or obtain any information shall be at your own risk and at your own risk. NTUB will not be liable for any damage or loss of data from your computer or mobile phone system due to the download or acquisition of any prior information.
6, the law of law and the court of jurisdiction

The interpretation and application of this "Rules and Statements of Use" and the disputes or disputes arising out of the use of this App by your users shall be in accordance with the laws of Taiwan. deal with.
